name: Detect AdBlock
author: Alobaidi

sections.description:
Detect AdBlock

Detect AdBlock and prevent browsing when the visitor has AdBlock in the browser.

The Features

  1. Easy to use and fast.
  2. SEO Friendly, no affected with SEO.
  3. Prevent website browsing using PHP Cookie and Session.
  4. Custom message with Preview.
  5. Translate the message to your language easily (in settings page).
  6. Prevent Detect AdBlock from some users (for example disable detect adblock if the user is admin or editor, etc).

Live Demo & Explanation of Use

  • http://wp-plugins.in/DetectAdBlock

Rate The Plugin

  • Please rate Detect AdBlock plugin

More Plugins

  • My Plugins
sections.installation:
Installation

  1. Upload ‘detect-adblock’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Read Explanation of Use
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Installation

  1. Upload ‘detect-adblock’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Read Explanation of Use

FAQ

  • Read explanation of use
  • For more questions or help, contact me.
  • Or on twitter.
